description.en:
1: Her Carriage  
Everyday, Kouta comes to pick up his best friend Aya on his bike. Aya is in love with Kouta, but Kouta is looking for a girlfriend. Will Aya ever be able to tell Kouta how he feels?  
  
2: Make-Believe Brothers  
Yuuta and Tomo are neighbors and childhood friends. The simple Tomo is always smiling and always persistently invites Yuuta to go out and do things with him, even though Yuuta always turns him down. Yet, that simplicity also seems courageous to Yuuta. Will one bike ride change everything between these two…?  
  
3: After-School Strawberry Flavor  
After finding candy in his desk for a few days, Tsuduru decides to leave something for the other person who uses the desk. When the candy remains untouched, Tsuduru writes a note on the desktop. One evening, while running errands for a teacher, Tsuduru meets his mysterious desk-mate Keigo. Tsuduru and Keigo continue to converse through notes on the desktop, but what is the significance of the strawberry-flavored candy which Keigo doesn't like any longer…?  
  
4: Finger  
Hayato and his boyfriend Akio are always making big plans and promises for the future. When Hayato accidentally discovers that Akio is leaving to study abroad in America, he's so hurt that he refuses to see him off at the airport. But will the item he finds in his locker change his mind – and what does it mean?!  
  
5: Four Leaf Clover  
The sickly Yukimoto fascinates Yoshida. Yuki, who seems to be the one who needs the most luck, easily finds four leaf clovers but always passes them on to others. As Yuki and Yoshida grow closer, Yoshida seems to become captivated by Yuki's charming smile…?  
  
6: Cello Mellow  
Mahoro, an attractive cellist, is a hopeless player who has never been in love before. One rainy day, after being kicked out by his girlfriend, he was taken in by the younger Sousuke. After a year of being woken by Sousuke, Mahoro finds himself fantasizing about him and decides to leave. Why is Sousuke so set against Mahoro leaving and why has Mahoro's playing taken on such a sensual feeling…?
